Articles.Content:
Hello people, I'd like to start by stating this is my first thread, so just hang in there if this is horrific.

Anyway, my suggestion to the devs is to add a little more interaction inside the cockpit. As you all know, in the current version, 0.21, has interaction that includes looking out a window and moving a throttle lever. By adding more interaction, I mean opening an airlock, pressing buttons to turn on ASAS and RCS, and maybe even walking through a docking module into other habitation modules.

If you would like to add anything to this, post ideas in the comments.
ok no offense this has been suggested time and time again plus this is on the do not suggest list so yeah

While Helix935 is correct, he could have been much more diplomatic.

SQUAD definitely plans to add Improved Inter-Vehicular Activity (IVA) to most (if not all) crew compartments in future versions of KSP. Since many people have suggested this time and again, the official policy has been to add it to the Already Suggested List.

In the future, it would be beneficial for you to first read the Already Suggested and the What Not To Suggest Lists before posting suggestions, so that this subforum isn't overfilled with multiple threads asking for the exact same things.

As much as I'd personally love IVA buttons, Helix935 and sumghai are right - this is on the what not to suggest list.

Thread Locked. Have a nice day.
